price: ئۇلاردىن بۇرۇن ئۆتكەنلەرنى بىز ھەقىقەتەن سىنىدۇق، ئاللاھ (ئىمانىدا) راستچىللارنى چوقۇم بىلىدۇ، (ئىمانىدا) يالغانچىلارنىمۇ چوقۇم بىلىدۇ[3].
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۖ فَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُواْ وَلَيَعۡلَمَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā alladhīna min qablihim falayaʿlamanna al-lahu alladhīna ṣadaqū walayaʿlamanna al-kādhibīna
translations: And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
and He will surely make evident
